turns.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, my name is Yusuf Rossi, and I received my order #W2378156 recently. I'd like to exchange two items in it—the mechanical keyboard and the smart thermostat. For the keyboard, I want something similar but with clicky switches; it should be full-size with RGB backlight if possible, but if there's no clicky option like that, I'd settle for one without backlight. And for the thermostat, I need one that's compatible with Google Home instead of Apple HomeKit. Can you help me set that up?

Hello Yusuf, thank you for reaching out. To assist with your exchange request for order #W2378156, I first need to verify your identity for security reasons. Could you please provide your email address, or your zip code (along with confirming your full name as Yusuf Rossi)? Once I have that, I can proceed.
Hello, yes, my full name is Yusuf Rossi, and my zip code is 19122. I don't recall my email address off the top of my head, but the zip code should work, right?

To proceed with the exchange for the mechanical keyboard (item ID: 1151293680) and smart thermostat (item ID: 4983901480), I've found the following available options that match your requests as closely as possible:

- For the mechanical keyboard (currently: linear switches, RGB backlight, full size, $272.33): The closest available option is a full-size keyboard with clicky switches and no backlight ($269.16). There is no available full-size clicky option with RGB backlight at this time. This would result in a $3.17 refund.
  
- For the smart thermostat (currently: Apple HomeKit compatible, black, $262.47): A Google Assistant (Google Home) compatible version in black ($249.01). This would result in a $13.46 refund.

The total price difference is a $16.63 refund, which would be processed to your original payment method (Mastercard ending in 2478). You don't have other payment methods on file, but if you'd like to use a different one (e.g., add a gift card), let me know before confirming.

This exchange can only be done once for the order. If these options work for you, please reply with "yes" to confirm and proceed. If not, provide more details on alternatives you'd prefer (e.g., different colors or features for the thermostat, or another keyboard option).

Yes, those options sound perfect—I'll go with the clicky keyboard without backlight and the Google Home compatible thermostat in black. Please proceed with the exchange and the refund to my Mastercard. How long will it take for the new items to arrive?

Thank you for confirming, Yusuf. I've processed your exchange request for order #W2378156. The status has been updated to "exchange requested," and the details are as follows:

- Exchanging Mechanical Keyboard (item ID: 1151293680, linear switches, RGB backlight, full size, $272.33) for a full-size keyboard with clicky switches and no backlight (item ID: 7706410293, $269.16).
- Exchanging Smart Thermostat (item ID: 4983901480, Apple HomeKit compatible, black, $262.47) for a Google Assistant (Google Home) compatible version in black (item ID: 7747408585, $249.01).

This results in a total price difference of -$16.63 (a refund), which will be processed to your Mastercard ending in 2478 within 5-7 business days after the return is confirmed.

You'll receive an email shortly with instructions on how and where to return the original keyboard and thermostat items. Once we receive and verify the return (typically within 7-10 business days of you shipping them back), the new items will be shipped to your address on file. The email will include the expected timeline for the new shipment based on current processing and shipping estimates.

If you have any questions or need help with the return process, let me know!

Thank you for handling that so smoothly—everything looks good on my end. I'll keep an eye out for the email with the return instructions. Have a great day!
